newsitem.title: UK: Polypipe buys B&H for maximum 5.5 mln stg.
newsitem.headline: Polypipe buys B&H for maximum 5.5 mln stg.

text.p: Polypipe Plc, a diversified plastic building products manufacturer, said on Wednesday it had acquired B&H (Loughborough) Ltd for a maximum 5.5 million stg cash.

Polypipe said it would pay 5.25 million stg on completion and a further 250,000 stg subject to adjustment downwards to reflect any shortfall as at March 31, 1997, of net assets of B&H below 3.1 million stg on a pound for pound basis.
B&H, a manufacturer of plastic pipes and fittings, had pretax profits of around 800,000 stg on turnover of some 19.7 million in the year to March 31.
